reasoning:

The four-heart flush would score 1,184 chips. Combined with my current 320, that reaches 1,504 total—enough to win the round. The hearts lineup (KH at 10, JH at 10, 9H at 9, and 5H at 5) provides solid chip generation, and the popcorn multiplier pushes the final score over the threshold needed.
